body:
This includes 
pvp
defending
rushing

example
Sfk is really good at rushing but not defending
StanMpl is really good at pvp but not good at rushing
spicy is good at rushing and defending but not that good at pvp compared to some people,
I suck at defending and rushing but decent at pvp


list the top 5 players on avicus that you think can do all of these, try not to say your self even if your a beast.
